com.colofabrix.mathparser.operators.special

Class TrigonometricOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.colofabrix.mathparser.expression.ExpressionEntry
      • com.colofabrix.mathparser.expression.Operator
        • com.colofabrix.mathparser.operators.special.TrigonometricOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Operator>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArcoshOperator, ArcosOperator, ArsinhOperator, ArsinOperator, ArtanhOperator, ArtanOperator, CoshOperator, CosOperator, SinhOperator, SinOperator, TanhOperator, TanOperator

    public abstract class TrigonometricOperator
extends Operator
    Represents a trigonometric operator

    This class is used to define common option and methods for all the trigonometri operators

    Author:
    Fabrizio Colonna

      • getRadians

        public org.apfloat.Apfloat getRadians(org.apfloat.Apfloat value)
                               throws ExpressionException
        Converts a degrees value from the specified value to radians

        The unit of measurement of the input value is the one that is set on the object. See setSelectedUnit(com.colofabrix.mathparser.operators.special.AngleUnit)

        Parameters:
        value - The value to convert. Its unit of measure is implicit
        Returns:
        The converted degrees expressed in radians
        Throws:
        ExpressionException

      • getCurrent

        public org.apfloat.Apfloat getCurrent(org.apfloat.Apfloat radians)
                               throws ExpressionException
        Converts a degrees value from radians to the currend unit

        The unit of measurement of the output value is the one that is set in the object. See setSelectedUnit(com.colofabrix.mathparser.operators.special.AngleUnit)

        Parameters:
        radians - The value to convert in radians
        Returns:
        The converted degrees expressed as the unit of measurement set in the object
        Throws:
        ExpressionException

      • executeParsing

        public Operator executeParsing(CmplxExpression postfix,
                      java.util.Stack<Operator> opstack,
                      Operators operators,
                      Memory memory)
                        throws ExpressionException
        This method is used to save a memory reference locally
        Overrides:
        executeParsing in class Operator
        Parameters:
        postfix - The full postfix stack, as it is build before the call to this method
        opstack - The full operator stack, as it is constructed befor the call to this method
        operators - A reference to the operators manager
        memory - A reference to the main math memory
        Returns:
        An instance of the operator to be pushed at the end of the operators stack,
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - The exception is thrown when there is an evaluation problem
